column4: Hey, new problem. I can't burn CD/DVDs. I get error "Error while burning. SCSI error on write(208,16): See MMC specs: Sense Key 3 "Medium error", ASC 10 ASCQ 00"
did you try a different disk?
maybe your lense is dirty. did you try to clean it?
why do you burn disks still. it's so yesterday :-)
